startpage.headline: Cloud Broker
startpage.subtitle: Welcome to Cloud Broker.
startpage.aboutsubtitle: The Cloud Broker connects all actors. It takes only a few minutes to find your suitable service.
startpage.firststepsubtitle: Based on your answers we find your required service types.
startpage.secondstepsubtitle: Make decissions and weight the priorities.
startpage.thirdstepsubtitle: Based on our matchmaking you will get detailed information about services.
startpage.fourthstepsubtitle: You require further information about services? Contact brokers and providers!
